title: Turok Evolution PC
description:
[TITLE]		==> Turok Evolution
[DATE]		==> 2003-10-23
[LANGUAGE]	==> English
[GROUP]		==> MYTH
[SIZE UNPACKED] ==> 1.54GB
[SIZE PACKED]	==> 160MB

Instructions:

1.Use WinRAR to extract the contents of TUROK.ACE to C:Program FilesTurok Evolution

2.Run C:Program FilesTurok Evolutionsetup.bat

3.Use C:Program FilesTurok EvolutionTurok4_Config.exe to configure the video settings. The video settings cannot be configured in-game.

4. Run the game with C:Program FilesTurok EvolutionTurok4.exe

5. If you move or rename the game folder, the game will hang when it loads. To fix this problem, run C:Program FilesTurok EvolutionSetupReg.exe

I re-created this torrent because tracker.prq.to is in a bad state of disrepair. This is the same as the previous torrent I uploaded except this torrent does not include Install.exe (it isn&#039;t needed anyway). I also updated the readme with clearer setup instructions.
